Summary._: [F] train service changes and delays because of an investigation at Roosevelt Island. See mta.info

Description._: [F] train service changes and delays because of an investigation at Roosevelt Island. See mta.info

LongDescription:
Some northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [M] line from 47-50 Sts-Rockefeller Ctr to Queens Plaza then along the [E] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av. 
Some northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [G] line from Bergen St to Court Sq then along the [E] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av. 
Some 71 Av bound [M] trains are stopping along [J] line from Delancey St-Essex St and end at Chambers St. 
These service changes are because of an investigation at Roosevelt Island. 
Expect delays in [E], [F], [G], [J] and [M] train service. 
Our crews are on scene working to repair service and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [A] No service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [A] No service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription: <b><i>Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection</i><br clear=left>[A] No service <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b>Rush Hours, 6 AM to 10 AM & 3:30 PM to 8 PM, Mon to Fri, until May 18<br><br>[A] trains that were scheduled to operate <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St will operate<br><i>to/from</i> Euclid Av instead.<br><br>[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel.<br><br>[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, <i>approximately every 20 minutes,</i> between <br><b>Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b> and <b>Beach 90 St</b> and via the [A] <i>to/from</i> <b>Far Rockaway-Mott Av</b>.<br><br>For<b> Beach 90 St, Beach 98 St, Beach 105 St</b> and <b>Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b>, <br>transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.<br><br><a href=http://www.mta.info/press-release/nyc-transit/nyc-transit-starting-subway-flood-protection-project-rockaways-next-month target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Click here</font></a> for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription: <b><i>Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection</i><br clear=left>[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead<br clear=left>[A] No rush hour service <i>to/from</i> Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b>All times, until Friday May 18, 2018<br><br>[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, <i>approximately every 20 minutes,</i> between <br><b>Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St</b> and <b>Beach 90 St</b> and via the [A] <i>to/from</i> <b>Far Rockaway-Mott Av</b>.<br><br>For <b>Broad Channel</b>, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.<br><br><b><i>Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:<br></b></i><a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q52-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/q052scur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Q53-SBS</font></a>, <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM16</font></a> and <a href=http://web.mta.info/busco/schedules/qm16cur.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>QM17</font></a> service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.<br><br><a href=http://www.mta.info/press-release/nyc-transit/nyc-transit-starting-subway-flood-protection-project-rockaways-next-month target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Click here</font></a> for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.<br><b><br>
